name: Boxface
description:
Boxface is the second game I ever made, and I can proudly say that I made everything except for the royalty free music (Credit to the amazing Kevin MacLeod of incomptech.com). It contains three worlds, where the third is just a challenge mode of the first. Collect little green dots in order to unlock the door of the level while avoiding falling to your demise and/or touching anything red. The second world is lacking, and the color scheme makes it really hard to see what's going on.

Controls:

Escape: return to level select

A & D keys: move left and right

Spacebar: Jump

Q: Ping to see surroundings in the dark world (charged)

E: Enter door

The original project files for this game are possibly lost to time, so odds of any updates are around zero.
